hi

I have some another basic questions on my quest for a "professional"
ja=
va environment with JUnit...

1. Basic JDK Installation
----=
----------------------

o you put those
contents?
WIN: C:\jse5, (others ?)
MAC: standard install pa=
th is /Library/Java/Home

arguments against
that path?)
NIX: ?

2. Java Libraries like JUnit
--------=
--------------------
where to put 3rd party libraries?

WIN: ?
MAC: /Develo=
per/Java, ~/Library/Java/, ... ?

3. Environment Settings for JUnit =
in .bash_profile
--------------------------------------------------

I thin=
k this is the right way to do it:

 export JUNIT_HOME=3D"/Developer/jlibs/j=
unit"
 PATH=3D$PATH:$JYTHON_HOME:$JUNIT_HOME

 export CLASSPATH=3D$CLASSPAT=
H:$JUNIT_HOME/junit-4.4.jar:$JUNIT_HOME


but why do I need
$JUNIT_HOME/jun=
it-4.4.jar
and

in the classpath?

t
